title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4814.3 - Individual and business entity statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4814.3 - Individual and business entity statement

State Regulations

Where the applicant is an individual, the application
shall be accompanied by an individual statement on form BC-103, as prescribed
by the commission. Where the applicant is a partnership, association, joint
venture or any business entity other than a corporation, the application shall
be accompanied by a business entity statement on form BC-104, as prescribed by
the commission. Each person named in form BC-104 shall file an individual
statement on form BC-103. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4814.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
